Text: Tak abo Israe̩l kʼe̩re̩ nyʼule̩, oñ ma lewa ru egbili Moab, ejudaba Jo̩rdan odede Je̩riko.
Bele̩k, o̩ma Zipo̩r, fʼe̩wñ du kʼIsrae̩l che abo Amo̩r li chaka.
Okpo la chi Moab ofe tod amone̩ le̩ todabu ku ma chʼewewe; o̩la abo Israe̩l la kʼuma o̩la.
Taku Moab ka ñw abogijo Midian kakini, Fai o̩wo̩ one̩-i afʼe̩wñ du ki lo wa daka-i na, alu kʼo̩kokuno̩ alʼegbe oko kpa. Oñ Bele̩k, o̩ma Zipo̩r kʼi la chʼonu Moab iko le̩,
fʼamonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo Belam, onu Beo̩r, Peto̩r, kʼi dʼo̩l Ohimini, oj ane̩ amo̩ma abo-wñ, kʼi fʼu do̩ wa; i kakini, Go, amone̩ʼka kwʼIjipti wa-i; ane̩ la bo̩ ñwu ma n, oñ ma kwojo̩ akpejuru mi-i.

Todule̩, agba, e̩ lewa fai, kʼe̩ fʼama na ñw amone̩-i mi; todu ma gbiti tʼumi le; ikani naneke gwo ma da, kʼu ne ma bʼane̩-i te̩; todu u chema ka kʼe̩ne̩ kʼuwe̩ kadua ñw u fʼe̩nyo̩ ne̩ me̩, oñ e̩ne̩ ku we̩ nama ñw u, ama fʼu mu me̩.
Abe̩le̩ abogijo Moab kpai abogijo Midian kwʼo̩mo̩ le, e̩wñ uro̩me̩ ifa ebo̩ le̩ jʼef o̩wo̩-ma, ma lewa ugbo Belam, oñ ma fʼuche̩ Bele̩k je̩rʼu.
Oñ i ka ñwu ma kakini, Me̩ ru emi odu-i ta, tak u nadʼohi ñwu me̩ alu ki Jihofa ako̩la ñwu mi; abe̩le̩ amagboji Moab le̩ kwogugu ugbo Belam.
Tak O̩jo̩ lewa ugbo Belam, oñ i kakini, Aboke̩le̩ ku ma jʼugbo-we̩-i chʼe̩ne̩?
Taku Belam ka ñw O̩jo̩ kakini, Bele̩k o̩ma Zipo̩r, onu Moab, kpʼone̩ wʼugbo mi kakini,
Go, amone̩ ku ma kwʼ Ijipti wa-i, ane̩ bo̩ ñwu ma n; fai e̩ lewa kʼe̩ nama ñwu ma; ikani naneke kʼogu bʼuma kʼu nane ma dufu.
Tak O̩jo̩ ka ñwu Belam kakini, Uwe̩ ki le kpai ama n, uwe̩ ki la anama ñw amone̩-i n, todu u mʼe̩nyo̩ du ñwu ma me̩.
Taku Belam kwane̩ odudu oñ i ka ñw amagboji Bele̩k, kakini, Me̩ nyʼane̩-me̩; todu Jihofa ko̩ eje̩ ñwu mi le bʼume̩.
Tak amagboji Moab le̩ kwane̩, oñ ma nyʼugbo Bele̩k, ma ka ñw u kakini, Belam ko̩ ele bʼuwa wa.
Taku Bele̩k ño̩ fʼamagboji omune̩ kpe̩ ge̩, ma wewe tule, ma ño̩ nʼojima tʼabo ejodudu le.
Oñ ma lewa ugbo Belam, ma la ka ñw u kakini, Abu ku Bele̩k, o̩ma Zipo̩r, ka de̩, kakini; Agba, e̩ ki je̩ ñw e̩wñ du dʼe̩ hi ewʼugbo mi n;
todu nahi uwe̩ nyo̩gba tef ojima ki nana tabale, e̩wñ du kʼuwe̩ aka ñwu mi nache; todule̩ o̩ko̩ nagba bʼuwe̩-i, lewa ke, kʼe̩ fʼama na ñw amone̩-i ñwu mi.
Belam muda dohi ñw amadu Bele̩k kakini, Dagba Bele̩k mʼajifa kpai o̩jamalia e̩ko̩ unyi-wñ ko ñwu mi, u neke le gu o̩la Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi du, kʼu nache e-ki nya abe̩k e-ki tule n.
Fai, o̩ko̩ nagba bʼame̩, me̩ ki ño̩ jʼemi odu-i ge̩, kʼomi ki ma alu ku Jihofa ñʼako̩la ñwu mi tʼe̩-i le ge̩,
Tak O̩jo̩ lewa ugbo Belam odu oñ i ka ñw u kakini, I chʼule̩ edo̩ we̩ oñ aboke̩le̩ le̩ lewa-i mak e̩ kwane̩ kʼe̩ le̩ bʼuma; ama chai e̩wñ kʼu naka ñw e̩, e-le̩ uwe̩ ache.
Taku Belam kwane̩ odudu, i la mʼofidi ko nʼubi o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ oñ i lebʼamagboji Moab le̩.
Uwe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ la mutajo todabu kʼi alo; tak onuche̩ Jihofa kwodago ej o̩na kʼi kobʼo̩. Belam tanʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ alo, abimo̩to̩-wñ meji la jʼugbo-wñ.
Tak o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ fʼonuche̩ Jihofa li abu kʼi fʼo̩kwo̩chageli wo̩ nʼo̩wo̩ dago ej o̩na; oñ o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩ muna bʼej o̩na te̩, i le tef egbe; taku Be̩lam fʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩ ja, kʼi rida tʼej o̩na.
Tak onuche̩ Jihofa le̩ lewa dago ugbo kʼo̩na chʼe̩kpama, kʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma jʼo̩wo̩ mejeji-wñ, kʼo̩do̩ dʼej emi kpai ej ano̩mo̩ ñw u.
Oñ o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩ fʼonuche̩ Jihofa li, i la fʼo̩la-wñ kuru o̩do̩, oñ i fʼe̩re̩ Belam de mʼo̩do̩; abe̩le̩ i ño̩ fʼu ja ge̩.
Tak onuche̩ Jihofa ño̩ le tʼo̩gba ge̩, oñ i kwodago ugbo ki che̩kpama, ugbo ki ma nʼuña kʼone̩ ana tʼawo̩to̩ abe̩k awohi n.
Oñ o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩ fʼonuche̩ Jihofa li, i la kwodachi, Belam dʼubi-wñ ta; tak uwe̩do̩ Belam mutajo, oñ i dʼo̩kpa gwo o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-wñ.
Taku Jihofa mʼalu o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩ chi, oñ o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩ ka ñwu Belam kakini, Ab u chʼuwe̩ kʼe̩ gwo mi onu me̩ta-i?
Taku Belam ka ñw o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ kakini, Todabu m kʼe̩ che mi ibe̩te̩-i o̩kwo̩chageli ma dʼo̩wo̩-mi, u ma fʼe̩ kpa.
Tak o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ le̩ ka ñwu Belam kakini, I chʼo̩ke̩ke̩te̩-we̩ u che n? e-kʼe̩ te̩tatano ubi-wñ akwe̩gba ku ma bi we̩ gbogbo tʼeñini n? U te̩tachʼuwe̩ abe̩le̩? Tak i kakini, O̩da.
Taku Jihofa mʼeju Belam chi, oñ i fʼonuche̩ Jihofa li abu kʼi adago ej o̩na kʼo̩kwo̩chageli-wñ chʼe̩wo̩ nʼo̩wo̩-wñ; tak i dʼoji lo̩ oñ i fʼeju bʼane̩ ma.
Tak onuche̩ Jihofa ka ñw u kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ja o̩ke̩ke̩te̩-we̩ onu me̩ta le̩ ta? go, omi dufu wa-i kʼu kobʼuwe̩, tod o̩na-we̩ kʼe̩ le chʼagbo̩ni eju-mi;
o̩ke̩ke̩te̩ la fʼumi li, i muna bʼumi o̩gba te̩ onu me̩ta-i. I ma na rʼo̩wo̩ʼka o̩gba-mi le̩ n, omi ma fʼe̩ kpa fai me̩ ku la mʼowñ gba kʼi deju chuu.
Taku Belam ka ñw onuche̩ Jihofa kakini, U fʼadure ta; todu u ma kʼuwe̩ dago ej o̩na akobʼumi n. Todule̩, fai, iche̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju-we̩ mak u namudabi.
Tak onuche̩ Jihofa ka ñwu Belam kakini, E̩ le bʼaboke̩le̩-i; ama chai o̩la kʼu naka ñw e̩, e-le̩ kate uwe̩ ki i ka. Abe̩le̩ Belam lebʼamagboji Bele̩k le.
Tak e̩gba ku Bele̩k gbo̩ ka ku Belam awa, i dufu kʼi ledʼo gbogbo wʼewo Moab, kʼi dʼalo̩me̩ Arno̩n, e-kʼi dʼotitala alo̩me̩ le̩.
Taku Bele̩k ka ñwu Belam kakini, Omi kpʼone̩ adʼe̩ wa una una n? E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ ma wʼugbo mi n? O̩wo̩-mi bo̩jo̩ kʼu nadʼuwe̩ nyʼo̩gba kʼe̩ nʼojima n?
Taku Belam ka ñwu Bele̩k kakini. Go, u lewa ugbo we̩ me̩! omi muda neke ko̩la duge̩? O̩la kʼO̩jo̩ du tef alu-mi, e-le̩ naka.
Taku Belam lebo̩ Bele̩k, oñ ma lewa Kiriat-huzot.
Taku Bele̩k kʼamokuno̩ kpai ame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpa, oñ i fʼuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo Belam kpai amagboji ku ma jʼugbo-wñ.
Oñ i lewatʼo̩jo̩ñwa-wñ, Belek la mu Belam du, oñ i mʼu du te̩gu nyʼugbo otete e-Beal ki gbo̩gba le̩; tak i fʼotitala ugbo kʼamone̩ le̩ te̩ kade li.
